entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
